description.en:
1-2: Your Love Cannot Be Easily Visible
Inori always goes to his friend Senou with his love troubles, because Senou always listens patiently. But lately Inori has been thinking about Senou in a different way...

3: Please Don't Let Go Of This Hand
Jinryou Aki just started at the clothing store where Goichi works, and Goichi can't help liking his cute new coworker. But Jinryou has a troubled past.

4: Good Luck Sleeping
Eight years after graduation, Hoshizono runs into his high school crush, Kure. In school, Hoshizono was always considered a brainy kid, while Kure was a jock. Now Hoshizono works at a gay host club and Kure is a successful businessman. Can these two reconnect?

5: Love Without Boundaries
Shouji, an established curator and Shimizawa, an up and coming advertising executive, have been living together for a month. But with such a new relationship, problems are still cropping up! 

6: Inside The Box With You
In an all boys school, there is nowhere to "do it". Nishimura tells Sugawara that it is common to help each other out...

7: The Temperature Inside My Hand
College student Takeru has a crush on fellow student Yukihito. But Yukihito is connected to Takeru's childhood in the snowy northern regions and the tragic incident which happened there.
